snippet.title: Bugs for the Atari 2600
snippet.description: I would say it is an okay lightgun-.shooter (yeah, you play this game with the paddle controller, but the genre is called lightgun-shooter) but there is this unnecessary little annoying thing that makes you lose 1 life if your cursor touches it.
